node.title: Filmmaker risks safety to shoot undercover documentary about lion trophy hunting
node.alt: Woman holding camera with a lion and game hunter in the background.
node.description: An Australian documentary maker creates a fake identity to film big game hunters in Africa in the hope her film will help to end trophy hunting.
node.content:
["An Australian filmmaker who went undercover to film a documentary about big game hunting in Africa\u00a0is hoping the movie will help to end trophy hunting.\u00a0", "Melbourne-based\u00a0Rogue Rubin\u00a0is a conservationist who wanted to explore the trophy hunting industry.", "Her initial efforts to infiltrate were unsuccessful\u00a0so she created a new online identity.", "\"I went on Facebook and said I love eating meat \u2014\u00a0I'm a vegetarian.", "\"I said my views are more Republican than they are \u2014\u00a0I created all of these things that fitted the mould of a stereotypical person who would love trophy hunting.\"", "It worked.\u00a0", "Rubin was granted a photographic internship on a game hunt\u00a0in exchange for the photographs and footage she captured.", "\"That changed the game for me and I didn't just go on lion hunts,\" she said.", "\"I went on all forms of hunts because I had to prove myself to be invited on a major lion hunt.\u00a0", "", "
It is illegal to bring lion trophies\u00a0into Australia.(Supplied: Olli Teirila)
", "
Fears of blowing her cover\u00a0
", "The filmmaker said she wanted to understand the mindset of trophy hunters and highlight the plight of wild lions, which WWF listed as vulnerable.", "\"[Trophy hunting] is legal, it's not an illegal practice, and the problem is that it should be illegal,\" she said.", "\"I knew elephants were endangered with about 50,000 left in the wild.", "\"I knew rhino were endangered \u2014\u00a0we all hear about rhino going extinct and there are\u00a030,000.\u00a0", "\"I had no idea that lions were on the verge of imminent extinction, there are\u00a0only 20,000 left in the wild.\"", "While filming Lion Spy,\u00a0Rubin said she feared her cover may have been exposed on a few occasions and she did initially feel unsafe.\u00a0", "", "
Rogue Rubin wants international trophy hunting banned.(Supplied: Rogue Rubin)
", "The filmmaker said hunters paid between $110,000 and $140,000\u00a0to kill a lion.\u00a0", "\"It's lucrative to a select group of individuals, a very highly select group of individuals,\" she said.", "Rubin said 64 per cent of lion trophy hunters were from the United States.", "\"Let's not discredit that Australians are trophy hunters too,\" she said.", "\"We are the only country that has banned the importation of lion trophies.\"", "
Political change key to end slaughter
", "Rubin hoped her film would bring about change and put an end to trophy hunting.", "\"I am already working with a few organisations internationally and we're looking at taking it further into politics,\" she said.", "", "
Big game hunting is legal in Africa.(Supplied: Rogue Rubin)
", "\"We're not looking at changing the African political landscape \u2014\u00a0that's not a battle we're going to win.\u00a0", "\"We have to look at changing the international view of the subject and we have to look at changing international politics.", "Preview screenings of Lion Spy will be held at various locations around Australia, including the Gold Coast and Toowoomba.", "The film will screen nationally on November 24."]
